entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
